Brian is an effective manager and talented content strategist. His motivation and passion for his work is infectious. His management style made me feel right at home from the start, and his leadership helped our small team reach massive milestones. He kept the lines of communication open to clarify expectations and provide feedback. I'm a better technical writer because I worked with Brian, and I'd happily join him on another project in the future.
